name: Jump IT!
description:
Jump IT!

Quick points:

  • Uses new custom Multiplatform game engine
  • Fast paced platformer
  • 2.5D concept

This was written exclusively for the DreamON 20th anniversary gamejam, as was the engine that it runs on.

Controls:

Sony PSP: Intuitive

Sega Dreamcast: Intuitive

Windows:

  • V = Jump/A
  • C = Back/B
  • X = X
  • Z = Y
  • Start = /
  • Movement = DPAD
  • Analog Emulation: IJKL (think WASD), unused
